## Description

According to [Annex IV of Commission Implementing Regulation EU No 390/2013](https://eur-lex.europa.eu/legal-content/EN/TXT/?uri=CELEX:32013R0390#:~:text=Commission%20Implementing%20Regulation%20%28EU%29%20No%20390%2F2013%20of%203,services%20and%20network%20functions%20Text%20with%20EEA%20relevance.), 
an ‘operational cancellation’ means an arrival or departure of a scheduled flight 
to which the following conditions apply: 

* the flight received an airport slot; and

* the flight was confirmed by the air carrier the day before operations and/or 
it featured in the daily list of flight schedules produced by the airport operator
the day before of operations; but 

* the actual landing or take-off did not occur.
